name: about:blank Zune
description:
Well, I installed the Royale Zune and Zune Firefox theme, then realized, I needed something to go with it. An about:blank page for when I hit Ctrl+T every 5 seconds. So there you have it, an about blank page with the Zune logo. 

If you want the awesome Windows XP Zune theme, go here: go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=75078

For the Firefox theme, go here:
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/59427
